comments:
Created an attachment (id=75097)
The report design that caused the problem

Hi,

I have a report with a bar chart in a group header. Preview and export to html is fine, but whenever I try to export it to pdf I get a NullPointerException (Stacktrace attached below).

If I remove the chart the export works.

It does not seem to be a general problem  of my environment, since I have other reports containing a bar chart that work. I tried using the eclipse Designer/Built in webviewer (pressing the "Print report as PDF"-Button) and standalone reporting engine, both with the same result.

Regards,
Stefan
